content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return the MySQL client library version:
<?php
echo mysqli_get_client_info();
?>
Definition and Usage
The get_client_info() / mysqli_get_client_info() function returns the MySQL client library version.
Syntax
Object oriented style:
$mysqli -> get_client_info()
Procedural style:
mysqli_get_client_info(
connection
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
connection
Optional. Specifies the MySQL connection to use
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns a string that represents the MySQL client library version
PHP Version:
5+

★
+1
